--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> NOTE: Important OOC at the bottom.
> 
> |---Megatron---|
> 
> The massive freighter shakes and threatens to break up as it slides 
> along the ground in the desperate attempt at a landing the 
Predacons 
> tried to execute. The ships bulky form crashed at the edge of a 
> swampy jungle like area, losing several of the lower decks, and 
many 
> sensory capabilities. The rear thrusters had also been damaged, and 
> one of the three had come off in the initial stages of the crash.
> 
> As the sliding speed of the craft decreases, Megatron holds on 
while 
> glancing at the rest of his crew. "Stop damnit..." he growls and 
his 
> words are punctuated by a bang as he is thrown forward, almost 
> losing his grips. The visual display of the remainging computer 
> showed that the ship had crashed into a thickly rooted tree, and 
had 
> been slowed down enough to stop the sliding. Their trail was rather 
> obvious unfortunately, a long groove in the rocks and soil followed 
> a path that lead right to the ship. He hoped that the Maximals had 
> encountered the same situation provided they had followed him-- no, 
> he knew that they were coming, and would likely be close behind.
> 
> Glancing around at his crew again. He starts giving out orders. 
They 
> needed to move, and to move quickly. "Drillbit, get on that 
computer 
> screen, and give me a status report, it looks bad." He steps down 
> from the command chair, and turns to Waspinator. Waspinator, get 
> outside and do some scouting. We need to know what the terrain is 
> like. Don't go too far, try to maintaina perimeter. Come back 
within 
> two hours." (ooC: email me for info about terrain)
> 
> Leaving those two to their tasks, he turns the the rest of 
crew. "We 
> have arrived, and we are by no means prepared to do anything but 
> make repairs at the moment. Nemesis Enforcer, go to the storage 
bay, 
> grab the repair kits, and some extra computer parts." Megatron 
> growls, <DELAYS... accursed delays...> "Perceptor, take 
Quickstrike. 
> You two go look for a suitable place to start mining Energon." Last 
> for the moment, "Inferno, make yourself useful, and bring back all 
> the salvagable scraps of metal that you can find that came off of 
> the ship during the crash."
> 
> He sits back in his command chair, "Yess... Everyone else, report 
> here for orders." The mighy transformer known as Megatron frowns 
> angrily at the unexpected results of going through the time-space 
> wormhole...
> 
> ooC: I was wondering what people think about having our world that 
> we are going to RPing on is going to resemble a developing form of 
> Pangea at about the late Triassic/early Jurrasic period, when it 
was 
> starting to divide into the continents. I could creat a map, unless 
> someone can find me a good one in black and white, for the 
worldmap, 
> and we could work off of of that. 
> 
> As for factions, we were going to have 5, the Maximals, the 
> Predacons, the Autobots, the Decepticons, and a neutral faction to 
> be determined by a vote. A question was brought up about groups of 
> bots that weren't in factions that, for example, wanted to hang out 
> together for survival etc. Since I'm not entirely sure how to deal 
> with that thought at the moment, the council will have a discussion 
> again soon regarding it.
> 
> Updates for the website will be done on thursday since that's my 
day 
> off (other than the weekends). I've got to email Yan and hopefully 
> get him to make some changes to the website. (not text related 
ones, 
> cause those are the only ones i can do)

Waspinator shifted into beast mode and flew out side "Waspinator 
never get important job, nothing here but trees" he mumbled as he 
flew looking at the rain forest as well as some mountains at the west.

"Maybe well get lucky and well find someone to thrash on the way" 
Quickstrike said to Perceptor.

"Yes my queen" Inferno said said flew out side and begun to drag the 
thruster that had broken off back.
